Class MovieList

java.lang.Object
MovieList
public class MovieList extends Object
A class representing a linked list of Movie objects. / public class MovieList { /* The first Movie in the list / public Movie head; /* The last Movie in the list / public Movie tail; /* The number of Movies in the list public int size; /**

    • addMovie

      public void addMovie(int nRow, int id, String original_title, String overview, double popularity, double vote_average, int vote_count)
      Adds a Movie to the end of the list.
      Parameters:
      nRow - the row number of the Movie in a data source
      id - the unique identifier of the Movie
      original_title - the original title of the Movie
      overview - a brief overview of the Movie
      popularity - the popularity of the Movie
      vote_average - the average rating of the Movie
      vote_count - the number of votes cast for the Movie

      public int indexOf(Movie left)
